Collection.LongName: MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity Daily L3 Global 1km SIN Grid
Collection.DataSetId: MODIS/Terra Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity Daily L3 Global 1km SIN Grid V006
Collection.Description: The MOD11A1 version 6 product provides daily, per-pixel land surface temperature (LST) in a 1200 x 1200 kilometer grid.  The pixel temperature value is derived from the MOD11_L2 swath product.  Above 30 degrees latitude, some pixels may have multiple observations where the criteria for clear-sky are met. When this occurs, the pixel value is a result of the average of all qualifying observations.  Provided along with both the day- and night-time surface temperature bands and their quality indicator layers, are MODIS bands 31 and 32 and six observation layers.  Validation at stage 2 has been achieved for all MODIS LST/Emissivity products.
Collection.CitationForExternalPublication: This data set was provided by the NASA EOS Project.

Contact.HoursOfService: M-F, 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. Central Time

Address.StreetAddress: U.S. Geological Survey, Earth Resources Observation and Science (EROS) Center

Characteristic.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristic.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

AdditionalAttribute.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: N_GRAN_POINTERS
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Total number of input granule files used to create this tile; number of elements in the InputGranulePointer archive metadata field.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAFRACTIONGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Fraction of pixels with good quality of product

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAFRACTIONNOTPRODUCEDCLOUD
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Fraction of pixels without product due to cloud

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAFRACTIONNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Fraction of pixels without product due to reasons other than cloud

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAFRACTIONOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Fraction of pixels with not so good quality of product

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttribute.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttribute.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: CLOUD_CONTAMINATED_LST_SCREENED
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Indicator of whether cloud-contaminated Land Surface Temperature values are screened off.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttribute.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority

OnlineResource.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
Interface to search, discover, and access EOS data products, and invoke available data services.
LP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available MODIS products and the ability to download them via HTTP.

The MODIS Reprojection Tool on the Web (MRTWeb) is available for selected MODIS land products.  MRTWeb’s capabilities include reprojecting to alternate map projections, spatial and spectral subsetting, resampling, and alternate output format options.

USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.

The USGS Global Visualization Viewer (GloVis) is an online search and order tool driven by browse images.  Users may select any geographical area of interest (for any given product) and view all available browse images for that area before deciding to order those products.

The Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC) is one of several discipline-specific data centers within the NASA Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS).  The LP DAAC Web page provides information about available data products, services, documentation, order interfaces, and tools.
